name: Ungnyeo
temple_description: An important being in ancient Korean mythology, she was favored by the sun god Hwanung and took on a human form. As she had no husband, she prayed to Hwanung again under the sacred sandalwood tree, hoping to be blessed with a child. Impressed by her devotion, Hwanung took her as his wife, and she became the mother of Dangun, the founder of the Korean nation.
